      "text": "Based on the following Odoo-related data, write a technical blog post in Markdown format.

{{ JSON.stringify($json.github) }}

5. Include relevant tags like: Odoo, ERP, Python, etc.
6. Write the main content (300-500 words)
7. Format as Astro blog frontmatter:

---
title: \"標題\"
description: \"描述\"
pubDate: \"{{ $now.format('yyyy-MM-dd') }}\"
tags: [\"Odoo\", \"ERP\"]
source: \"rss\"
author: \"蘇勃任\"
---

文章內容...

Output ONLY the complete markdown file content, nothing else."
    }]
  }],
  "generationConfig": {
    "temperature": 0.7,

  }
